name: IPv4 History Visualization Interactive
description: An animated slideshow presentation of the history of IPv4, using a Sankey diagram to visualize the flow of IPv4 address allocations since inception in 1977, through various address management organizations and policies.

organizations: CAIDA, San Diego Supercomputer Center, University of California San Diego
CAIDA, San Diego Supercomputer Center, University of California San Diego
CAIDA, San Diego Supercomputer Center, University of California San Diego
